sentences.en: But why does the CPI overstate actual inflation?
sentences.cn: 但是为什么CPI是夸大了实际的通胀 呢 ?

sentences.en: Don't overstate your case or no one will believe you.
sentences.cn: 不要夸大自己的情况,要不没人相信你的话.
不要把你的情况夸大了.

sentences.en: He tends to overstate his case when talking politics.
sentences.cn: 他一谈政治便流于夸夸其谈。

sentences.en: I cannot overstate the importance of long - term projects.
sentences.cn: 我不能过于夸大 长期 拍摄项目的重要性.

sentences.en: It is hard to overstate the magnitude of the turnaround.
sentences.cn: 其转机的幅度之大,不论怎样形容也不算过分.

sentences.en: It is possible to overstate the benefits of stabilization.
sentences.cn: 稳定性带来的好处有可能被夸大.

sentences.en: Shaking firmly to write when being homesick one may overstate careing of what continuously.
sentences.cn: 想家时紧握着一缕缕可夸何的牵挂.

sentences.en: The importance of a child’s early years cannot be overstated (= is very important ).
sentences.cn: 儿童幼年期的重要性怎么强调也不为过。

sentences.en: The importance of fair value accounting to responsible systemic risk management is hard to overstate.
sentences.cn: 公允价值会计准则对负责任系统风险管理的重要性,怎么夸大都不为过.

sentences.en: To say that all motorists speed in residential areas is overstating the case.
sentences.cn: 说所有驾驶员都在住宅区内超速行驶是言过其实了。

sentences.en: Van Gogh's landscape painting , color overstate very and to be very peculiars.
sentences.cn: 凡高的风景画, 色彩很夸张很奇特.

sentences.en: We must neither ignore our problems nor overstate them.
sentences.cn: 我们既不要忽视双方之间的问题,也不要夸大这些问题.

sentences.en: We shouldn't overstate our past achievements.
sentences.cn: 我们不要夸大已经取得的成绩.

words.tran_cn: 夸大；夸张；过分强调（overstate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to talk about something in a way that makes it seem more important, serious etc than it really is

trans.tran_cn: 夸大（某事），把…讲得过分，夸张
